topic: 90% of people reuse the same 3-4 passwords across 100+ accounts. Hackers know this â€” they crack one and try it everywhere. It's called credential stuffing, and it works on billions of accounts every year.
title: Your Password is Already Leaked ðŸ”‘
narration: Did you know 90% of us reuse the same few passwords across tons of accounts? Hackers love this! Once they crack one, they try it everywhere, a tactic known as credential stuffing. This method compromises billions of accounts annually. Stay safe, mix up your passwords!
videoPrompt: Scene 1: Close-up of hands typing the same password on multiple devices. Scene 2: A hacker's screen filled with code and flashing 'Access Granted'. Scene 3: A globe with lines connecting it, signifying global reach and impact. End with a secure lock image glowing. Photorealistic, dark tones with a hint of blue cyber glow.
ytDesc: Most people reuse their passwords, making them vulnerable. Learn about credential stuffing and protect yourself! #cybersecurity #passwords #hackers #internetsecurity #onlinesafety
source: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), 2020
